messages.title: You don't have to settle for politics as usual!
THERE'S NO NEED TO VOTE TACTICALLY
messages.content: Labour has a big majority and the only way they won't win is if we do instead. So vote with your heart!

messages.title: VOTE BOLD! VOTE BRAVE! VOTE GREEN!
messages.content: For YOU, ME, our CHILDREN, OUR COMMUNITY, for the NHS, for climate action, a fair economy FOR THE COMMON GOOD BECAUSE GREENWICH NEEDS A GREEN!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supports climate action for a better community.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour has a big majority in Greenwich & Woolwich constituency. The tactical suggestion is to vote with the heart instead of tactically as the only way Labour won't win is if the Green Party does instead.

issues.environment: Supports climate action for a better community.

images.caption: Vote Bold! Vote Brave! Vote Green!
